bach.title: Bach @ PNCA
bach.bio: New location for 2015. Come play a work of art among the art in Southeast. Decorated by Ryan Bubnis and sponsored by the Portland Piano Company.

bartok.title: Bartok @ Washington High School
bartok.bio: This little red monster may have 50% more eyes than our average piano, but it sounds as sweet as can be. Decorated by Struck Agency and sponsored by Harold Goldstein.

beethoven.title: Beethoven @ Montavilla Park
beethoven.bio: So Portland! The creative folks at Doug Fir Lounge put the maps on this piano as we put the piano on the map!

brahms.title: Brahms @ ADX
brahms.bio: It's a whole band in one piano! Not really a public piano, but you can play it when you are at the wonderful ADX facility. Go on in and give it a try! Open during ADX hours.

clementi.title: Clementi @ Eastbank Esplanade
clementi.bio: Currently at the Vera Katz Statue on the Eastbank Esplanade. Go serenade her now! Sponsored and decorated by the inventive artists at Awesome Portland.

liszt.title: Liszt @ Columbia Park
liszt.bio: This piano is uniquely Portland and a must-see work of art.  Decorated by North and sponsored by  Becker Capital Management, Inc.

mozart.title: Mozart @ Portland Art Museum
mozart.bio: We are always proud to place our first public piano with our good friends at the Portland Art Museum. Open during museum hours. Decorated by Jennifer Mark and Juliet Moran of Open Eye Art and sponsored by Umpqua Bank.

scarlatti.title: Scarlatti @ Sellwood River Park
scarlatti.bio: A wonderfully elegant piano down on the waterfront. Open during park hours. Decorated by Bureau of Betterment and sponsored by Hilton Portland & Executive Tower.
